title: Andreessen Horowitz Wants To Fix NFT Copyright With Its 'Can't Be Evil' Lic
excerpt: Venture capital firm Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) is trying to clean up the messy state of crypto copyright. From a report: Last week, the company introduced what it dubs "Can't Be Evil" licenses: a series of agreements that let creators grant non-fungible token owners partial or near-complete rights ...
